Achievements.Title: Bookshelf hidden door
Achievements.Description: Aline: Enter the code on the books and open the hidden door in Manor Grand Library.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Symbol of Light
Achievements.Description: Aline: Use the flashlight with cover and form the correct symbol.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Light Beam
Achievements.Description: Aline: Combine the flashlight and the metal cover.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: If he appears again, I'll blow up his head!
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Rocket Launcher Pistol.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Here lies Hybrid Elder. I guess...
Achievements.Description: Aline: Defeat Hybrid Elder in Cemetery.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Stop, don't chase me more!
Achievements.Description: Aline: Defeat Hybrid Elder in Rocky Terrain.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: You again!?
Achievements.Description: Aline: Defeat Hybrid Elder in Steps Garden.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Save your soul, young lady
Achievements.Description: Aline: Combine the 2 Half of Medallion and create the Bronze Sun.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Poor Howard...
Achievements.Description: Aline: Defeat Hybrid Elder in Grand Library.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Father?
Achievements.Description: Aline: Find Obed Morton in Fort Interior.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The truth about Alan Morton
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Engraved Cube.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The hunter becomes the hunted
Achievements.Description: Aline: Kill the 2 Hounds of Tindalos in Obed's office.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Mirror Breaker Specialist
Achievements.Description: Aline: Break the mirror in Obed's office.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Never listen the darkness
Achievements.Description: Aline: Refuse to give the mirror to the Ghost.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Finders Keepers
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Greande Launcher.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: That's strange. What's happening here?
Achievements.Description: Aline: Look through the door.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: It's my luck day!
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Triple-Barreled Shotgun.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Perfect Timing
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Revolve and kill your first enemy at same room.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Now you don't get up anymore
Achievements.Description: Aline: Defeat Hybrid Elder in Lightning Conductor Room 1F.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Aline in the Dark
Achievements.Description: Finish the game as Aline Cedrac.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Dark Obed Morton
Achievements.Description: Aline: Avoid the cursed Obed Morton form without taking damage and go to the next scenario.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Carnby, I saw Alan
Achievements.Description: Aline: Use the walkie-talkie and contact Carnby after to see Alan Morton escaping in World of Darkness.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Seven Gods of Light
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Stone Pyramid.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Stun gun? I like it
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Lightning Gun.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The weapon of the Jeremy's notes
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Photoelectric Pulsar.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Drakar Anni
Achievements.Description: Aline: Kill 90 creatures before World of Darkness.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Thanks God, this works yet
Achievements.Description: Aline: Use the Perforator with Energy Stone on the old cannon.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Flashlight is a weapon too
Achievements.Description: Aline: Use the Flashlight and expel Phocomelus from Lucy's bedroom.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Engineer, in my free time
Achievements.Description: Aline: Combine and create the Perforator with Energy Stone.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: I'm getting tired of you
Achievements.Description: Aline: Defeat Hybrid Elder in Fort Outskirts.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Planetary Alignment
Achievements.Description: Aline: Enter the month, day and year code in planetarium.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: I've never seen a gun like this
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Plasma Cannon.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Flash, Star, Sun & Moon
Achievements.Description: Aline: Use the cards and unlock the door mechanism.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: It's not like a 3d print but it'll works
Achievements.Description: Aline: Use the machine and create the Perforator Barrel.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Perfect material for a mould
Achievements.Description: Aline: Take the Steel Lingot.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Secret Compartment
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Use the crowbar and find the hidden compartment.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Genealogy
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Unlock all the 4 portraits in one sitting.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: What kind of weapon is that?
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Take the Plasma Cannon.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Tower Code
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Solve the Light Switches puzzle in the Manor Grand Library and open the hidden passage.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Equilibrium
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Push the books in the correct order in Manor Grand Library.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Procuraptor
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Defeat Procuraptor in Manor Grand Library.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Secret Passage
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Open the hidden passage in Manor Grand Library.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Creatures of the Night
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Kill 50 creatures before World of Darkness.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Lethal Damage
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Take the Rocket Launcher Pistol.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Manor Completed
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Finish Manor and across its front gate.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Guardians of the Night
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Use the Wolf Mask.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Shaman
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Turn off the light switch in Obed's Office and find the hidden painting.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Flask
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Use the flask and solve the puzzle.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Two creatures with one bullet
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Take the Grenade Launcher.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Patriarch
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Solve the bust marble puzzle.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: What a beauty!
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Take the Triple-Barreled Shotgun.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Phocomelus
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Defeat Phocomelus without being hit.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Aline? Aline?? Shit!
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Check the Manor front gate.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Umbra Magna Est
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Press the 3 sacred symbols on the panel and open the secret passage.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: El War Qarn'bi
Achievements.Description: Finish the game as Edward Carnby.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Dark Alan Morton
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Defeat the cursed Alan Morton form without taking damage.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Lair of Darkness
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Kill 150 enemies in World of Darkness in one sitting.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: A slow cast but good range
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Take the Photoelectric Pulsar.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Electric waves? This is my favorite gun now
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Take the Lighting Gun.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Go back to the Darkness
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Kill 100 creatures before World of Darkness.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Yeah! Another statue collected
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Collect the Indian Statue of Ouphenos
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Okay, thanks. but give me a break...
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Finish Underground Laboratory and receive another call from Aline...
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Nightmare Begins
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Kill your 4 first enemies in East Garden 2.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: CSI: Shadow Island
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Find the 3 sacred symbols in one sitting and at the first attempt.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Ultra Blue
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Combine the flashlight and the blue lens.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Sorry mate, I can't do anything for you
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Escape from the sinking airplane.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Ritualistic
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Pronounce the correct words sequence in the steles ritual.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The Sacrifice
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Find the severed head.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: You don't need it anymore
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Loot the dead body.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Celestial Conjunction
Achievements.Description: Carnby: Unlock the padlock using the engraved metallic plate.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos
